scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp src/appsscript.json dist/ && esbuild src/api.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/api.gs --format=iife --banner:js="var global = this;" --footer:js="function generateSlides(data){ return global.generateSlides(data); } function doPost(e){ return global.doPost(e); } function doGet(e){ return global.doGet(e); }"
